location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to Captain Robert Taylor, Resident at Bussorah [Basra]

mods.abstract: Letter forwarding a copy and translation of the report submitted by the Commander of the Imam's fleet to the Imam of Muscat, which made reference to a message which it was claimed was communicated to them during Captain Taylor's mediation between the Government of Muscat and the Government of Bussorah [Basra].A note below the letter states that the copy and translation can be found on page 145 (folio 75) of the volume.
